description.raw:
This PR implements a one-liner installation for the SRCSim project. The intend is to be able to call the whole installation + some of the configurations steps by invoking `curl -sSL https://get.srcsim.gazebosim.org | sh`.

The functionality can be manually triggered by run: `sh release-toosl/one-line-installations/srcsim.sh`

The PR also implements the creation of the test job. Currently the testing job is able to install all the requirements (note that the runtime testing could be failing):

 * http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/srcsim-install-one_liner-trusty-amd64/13/console#console-section-6

This PR in combination with the [SRCSim setup.bash file](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/srcsim/pull-requests/40/create-a-helper-setupbash-system-file/diff) should reduce the SRCSim setup to just: 1. run one-liner 2. source setup.bash 3. use the launch files.
